transcript: officers, Prince Andrew was gallop- ing along in a post chaise enjoying the feel- ings of a man who has at length begun to at- tain a long-desired happiness. As soon as he closed his eyes his ears seemed filled with the rattle of the wheels and the sensation of vic- tory.
